Docs.summary: The namespace deals with general security-related topics, for example, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks For topics dealing with security tokens and certificates, for example <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.WrappedKeySecurityToken> see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens>.
For security topics that overlap with the service model, for example <xref:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity>, see <xref:System.ServiceModel>.
